name: vscode-last-log
description: View the most recent file in a configurable folder

lastLog.folderPath.markdownDescription: Specifies the folder path containing the log files. Default value is **'logs'** which represents: **\myWorkspaceFolder\logs**. To navigate back outside the workspace add ..\ for each folder.

lastLog.fileExtension.description: The file extension of the log files. If unset or set to '*' it will work on any file type.

lastLog.includeSubfolders.description: Specifies if the logs located in folders are to be considered (any depth level). Default true.

lastLog.excludeFolders.description: Specifies a list of folders to be ignored (it only has effect when includeSubfolders is set to true).

lastLog.logRetentionTime.description: Sets the maximum age (in minutes) of log files in the workspace. Files older than this limit will be deleted. This action will trigger when opening a log file. If unset or set to 0 this functionality will be disabled, and no log files will be deleted from the folder. Default 0.
